title: Quiz
content:
Chapter Quiz

Answer the following questions to check your understanding of this chapter's topics.

questions.question: In the context of 'Custom Components', which statement about react component basics is most accurate?
choices: React Component Basics always requires external services to work in Streamlit.
React Component Basics is useful in some cases, but you should evaluate complexity and UX trade-offs.
React Component Basics is deprecated and should be avoided in all Streamlit apps.
React Component Basics only works when running Streamlit in Docker.
questions.explanation: React Component Basics is a powerful pattern, but like most advanced techniques, it should be used judiciously with attention to user impact and maintainability.

questions.question: In the context of 'Custom Components', which statement about advanced ui widgets is most accurate?
choices: Advanced UI Widgets always requires external services to work in Streamlit.
Advanced UI Widgets is useful in some cases, but you should evaluate complexity and UX trade-offs.
Advanced UI Widgets is deprecated and should be avoided in all Streamlit apps.
Advanced UI Widgets only works when running Streamlit in Docker.
questions.explanation: Advanced UI Widgets is a powerful pattern, but like most advanced techniques, it should be used judiciously with attention to user impact and maintainability.
